attributes.action: Not to raise National Insurance, Income Tax or VAT this Parliament
attributes.additional_details: With the gap between inflation and pay continuing to rise, the people of the UK are becoming worse and worse off. We believe increasing National Insurance, Income Tax or VAT will just widen the gap leaving the public worse off.
attributes.background: The people of the UK pay plenty of tax through VAT, Income Tax, National Insurance, Fuel Duty, Inheritance Tax and many other Government schemes. It's up to the Government to handle the money it receives in taxes in a more efficient way rather than keep demanding more from the people.
